text: Dollhouse is the debut extended play by American singer-songwriter Melanie Martinez, released May 19, 2014, by Atlantic Records and Warner/Chappell."Melanie Martinez", Atlantic Records, July 16, 2015 The EP was primarily produced and co-written by hip hop duo Kinetics & One Love.Rachel Mcrady, "Martinez Releases Haunting "Dollhouse" Single", US Weekly Dollhouse peaked at number four on the Billboard Heatseekers Albums chart. ==Background== On April 7, 2014, it was reported by Marketwired that Martinez had signed to Atlantic Records. It was also announced that Martinez would release her debut extended play on May 19, 2014, and would go on a tour promoting the EP beginning on June 4, 2014. == Chart performance == Dollhouse spent 13 weeks on the Billboard Heatseekers Albums chart, where it peaked at number four on June 7, 2014. ==Track listing== == Charts == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !Chart (2014) !Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2014 debut EPs Category:Melanie Martinez (singer) albums
title: Dollhouse (EP)
